backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products, purchases, sessions, user profiles, and access control with initial seeding and role‑based actions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component routing between login, shop, and admin views based on auth state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, dynamic year, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header showing logo, username, and logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card UI for displaying product details, price, and view/sold‑out actions.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseDialog.t: Dialog for viewing product details and submitting purchase requests.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Wrapper enabling system‑based theme switching via next‑themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor tied to identity and reinitializes queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomAuth.ts: Zustand‑based auth store managing username login, admin flag, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for login, profile management, admin checks, and product retrieval, calling backend actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme CSS variables and component overrides, including Radix UI background fixes.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Returns a product's image data URL if available, otherwise null.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing purchases and products, including creation, deletion, and image upload.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Username-based login page validating allowed users and triggering backend login via custom auth hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shop interface displaying products by category and showing purchase dialog, with auto-refetch on close.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode via class, custom theme extensions for colors, border radius, fonts, and includes animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state for removing all backend authentication and authorization, listing related feature requests and architectural notes.
